item.title: Behavioral Activation Therapy Cuts Perinatal Suicide Risk
item.description: In perinatal adults, suicide ideation decreases 25% with each behavioral activation treatment session. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Infection Risks Differ in Two Patient Groups on Adalimumab
item.description: Adults with hidradenitis suppurativa treated with adalimumab have a greater risk for serious infections than those with psoriasis, particularly sepsis...

item.title: Early Access to Weight Loss Jabs in NICE Diabetes Plan
item.description: NICE has proposed earlier access to SGLT-2 inhibitors and weight loss drugs for people with type 2 diabetes, marking the biggest shift in care for a d...

item.title: Do Women With ACS Face Unnecessary Bleeding Risk?
item.description: A European consensus statement says antithrombotic treatment for acute coronary syndromes should adjust for sex differences in bleeding risk. Medscape...

item.title: Epigenetic Aging May Be A Biomarker for Respiratory Disease
item.description: A population-based NHANES survey showed accelerated markers of aging in adults with wheezing and emphysema. Medscape Medical News
